actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the trustees of the Salem Wesleyan Church a certain parcel of land of the United States at the Jim Woodruff Dam and Reservoir project in Florida.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey to the trustees of the Salem Wesleyan Church (in Sneads, Florida) all right, title, and interest of the United States to 2.30 acres of land at the Jim Woodruff Dam and Reservoir project. Requires that any surveying costs necessary as an incident to the conveyance be borne by the trustees of the Salem Wesleyan Church.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the trustees of the Salem Wesleyan Church a certain parcel of land of the United States at the Jim Woodruff Dam and Reservoir project in Florida.
